BLOODTHIRSTER.equipped_with: This model is equipped with: hellfire breath; great axe of KhorneBLOODTHIRSTERBloodthirsters are supreme warriors, ferocious embodiments of the Blood God’s rage and murderlust. Commanders and champions of the Khornate daemon legions, Bloodthirsters are possessed of supreme martial skill. They wield baroque weapons of appalling power, and slaughter all in their paths.

unit_abilities.Lord of Decapitations: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
unit_abilities.Skulls for Khorne: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll. Each time this model destroys an enemy Character unit, you gain 1CP.

SKULLTAKER.equipped_with: This model is equipped with: the Slayer Sword.

unit_abilities.Bloodmaster: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
unit_abilities.A Gory Path: Each time this model’s unit Consolidates, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

BLOODMASTER.equipped_with: This model is equipped with: blade of blood.

unit_abilities.Devastating Charge: Each time this model’s unit ends a Charge move, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

unit_abilities.Blood Throne: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this model. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly KhorneLegiones Daemonica unit makes an attack that targets that unit, improve the Strength, Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics of that attack by 1.
unit_abilities.Champion Slayer: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a Character or Monster unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll. Each time this model destroys an enemy Character or Monster unit, this model regains up to D6 lost wounds.

unit_abilities.Pack Leader: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.
unit_abilities.Prey of the Blood God: At the start of the first battle round, select one enemy unit to be this model’s prey. Weapons equipped by models in this model’s unit have the[LETHAL HITS]ability when targeting this model’s prey. Each time this model’s prey is destroyed, select one new enemy unit to be this model’s prey.

unit_abilities.Split: Each time a Blue Horror model in this unit is destroyed, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, if this unit is not destroyed, roll one D6 for that model. On a 4+, add one Brimstone Horror model to this unit. unit_abilities.Exploding Horrors: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one or more Brimstone Horror models in this unit. For each Brimstone Horror model you select, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model is destroyed and that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

unit_abilities.Split: Each time a Pink Horror or Blue Horror model in this unit is destroyed, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, if this unit is not destroyed, roll one D6 for that model.
